name: Informants of the Frosted Dream
description: Hailing from the high reaches of Mt. Kalfus, the Informants of the Frosted Dream are known for their exceptional frost flashmarble craftsmanship. Now working as diviners - those who navigate the dreams of others in order to heal mental afflictions, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
